channel.title: v8ctf on Xploiter
channel.description: Recent content in v8ctf on Xploiter

item.title: Babychrome Linectf
item.description: Patch diff --git a/src/compiler/simplified-lowering.cc b/src/compiler/simplified-lowering.cc index da7d0b0fde..f91eea1693 100644 --- a/src/compiler/simplified-lowering.cc +++ b/src/compiler/simplified-lowering.cc @@ -186,12 +186,12 @@ bool CanOverflowSigned32(const Operator* op, Type left, Type right, // We assume the inputs are checked Signed32 (or known statically to be // Signed32). Technically, the inputs could also be minus zero, which we treat // as 0 for the purpose of this function. - if (left.Maybe(Type::MinusZero())) { - left = Type::Union(left, type_cache->kSingletonZero, type_zone); - } - if (right.
